name: Story-Missions
title: Story Missions - [Scenario Pack]
author: GreenFlagCZ
description: New scenario campaign mod for Factorio contains a total of 10 full scripted missions. Each mission has a series of mandatory and optional tasks. You can enjoy more then 20 hours of pure gameplay and lore-friendly story about YOU, the engineer who survived the harsh conditions of the unknown planet where crash-landed years ago.
